home.title: Software Portfolio
home.description: I'm a software developer specializing in building modern web applications with Vue, React, Nuxt.js, and Next.js. I have a passion for creating beautiful, responsive user interfaces with clean code.

hero.title: Nice to meet you, I'm
hero.description: I'm a student at BYU-I getting a Bachelors in Software Development. I love using technology to solve problems. I don't just write code; I take initiative, learn fast, and chase down solutions until they stick.

projects.notFoundDescription: The project you are looking for does not exist. Please check the URL or return to the projects page.

list.title: FileX
list.description: A modern file-sharing application built with Next.js and TypeScript, featuring drag-and-drop uploads, real-time notifications, and seamless file management. FileX combines elegant UI design with robust backend functionality for effortless file sharing and organization.

features.title: Drag & Drop Interface
features.description: Intuitive file upload system with drag-and-drop functionality, progress indicators, and real-time upload status. Support for multiple file types with automatic file validation and size checking.

features.title: Time-Based File Organization
features.description: Files are automatically organized by upload date with recent files prominently displayed. Files older than 3 days are intelligently archived in a collapsible section, keeping your workspace clean while maintaining easy access to all uploads.

features.title: One-Click Downloads
features.description: File Saver integration enables instant file downloads with a single click. Users can download individual files or bulk download multiple files as ZIP archives without complicated steps.

features.title: Animated User Experience
features.description: Framer Motion powers smooth animations throughout the interface, from file upload progress to page transitions. Material-UI components ensure consistent, accessible design patterns.

features.title: Cloud Storage Integration
features.description: Cloudinary backend handles file storage, optimization, and delivery with PostgreSQL database for metadata management. Secure file access controls and sharing permissions protect user data.

list.title: Task Manager Todo List
list.description: A comprehensive task management application built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Prisma ORM. Features secure authentication, real-time task updates, and an intuitive interface for personal productivity and task organization.

features.title: Inline Task Editing
features.description: Edit tasks directly in the list without navigating to separate pages. Click-to-edit functionality ensures quick task updates and seamless workflow management.

features.title: Secure Authentication
features.description: NextAuth integration with Google provider offers secure user authentication. Personal task lists remain private and accessible only to authenticated users through their Google account.

features.title: Smart Task Organization
features.description: Organize tasks with priority levels, due dates, and completion status. Filtering and sorting options help users focus on what matters most and track their productivity.

features.title: Responsive Design System
features.description: Material-UI components with Tailwind CSS create a consistent, accessible interface across all devices. Dark and light theme support adapts to user preferences.

features.title: Database Persistence
features.description: Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL ensures reliable data storage and retrieval. Real-time updates and optimistic UI updates provide instant feedback while maintaining data integrity.

list.title: Real-Time Chat App
list.description: A sophisticated real-time messaging application built with Next.js, Ably realtime infrastructure, and Redux state management. Features instant messaging, conversation management, and seamless multi-user communication with modern UI patterns and data persistence.

features.title: Google Authentication
features.description: Secure user authentication powered by NextAuth with Google provider integration. Users can sign in with their Google accounts for personalized conversations and message history.

features.title: Real-Time Messaging
features.description: Instant message delivery powered by Ably's realtime infrastructure. Messages appear immediately across all connected clients.

features.title: Advanced Message Management
features.description: Edit and delete messages with hover-activated context menus. Message history with timestamps.

features.title: Infinite Scroll & Performance
features.description: React Query enables efficient infinite scrolling through conversation history with automatic caching and background updates. Optimized rendering handles thousands of messages smoothly.

features.title: Global State Management
features.description: Redux toolkit manages complex application state including user sessions, conversation lists, message threads, and real-time connection status across the entire application.

features.title: Multi-User Conversations
features.description: Create group chats, manage conversation members, and handle multiple concurrent discussions. PostgreSQL database ensures message persistence and conversation history retention.

list.title: Sudoku Solver
list.description: A full-featured Sudoku web application built with Erlang, React, and Next.js, deployed on Railway with Docker for scalability. The app offers both puzzle solving and interactive gameplay with smart input validation and error checking. Features include multi-difficulty puzzle generation, real-time duplicate detection, and an intuitive interface that supports keyboard navigation and automatic cell advancement.

features.title: Smart Sudoku Input
features.description: Paste a full puzzle (81 numbers with 0 for blanks) to instantly populate the board. As you type, cells auto-advance, highlight duplicates in rows/columns, and support intuitive keyboard navigation (arrow keys, backspace erase).

features.title: Sudoku Solver Engine
features.description: Backend written in Erlang using a recursive backtracking algorithm to validate and solve any puzzle.

features.title: Play Mode
features.description: Generate puzzles across five difficulty levels (Easy → Evil). Error checking highlights invalid moves, prevents overwriting correct numbers, and tracks your mistakes until victory.

features.title: Responsive Web UI
features.description: Built with React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript for smooth, modern interactions across devices.

features.title: Containerized & Deployed
features.description: Backend and frontend packaged with Docker and deployed on Railway for easy scalability and hosting.

list.title: Vocab Extractor Extension
list.description: A Chrome browser extension built with HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript for extracting vocabulary data from Duolingo practice word sessions. Designed for simplicity and efficiency, this lightweight extension operates entirely within the browser, ensuring user privacy and minimal resource usage.

features.title: Duolingo Integration
features.description: Seamlessly extracts vocabulary words, translations, and context from active Duolingo practice sessions without interfering with the learning experience or requiring manual input.

features.title: JSON Export System
features.description: Automatically formats extracted vocabulary into clean, structured JSON with word and translation pairs.

features.title: One-Click Operation
features.description: Simple browser extension interface with single-click vocabulary extraction. No complex setup required - works immediately after installation from the Chrome Web Store. No need to input usersnames, passwords, or personal data.

features.title: Lightweight & Secure
features.description: Built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for minimal resource usage. No external dependencies or data collection - all processing happens locally in the browser.

list.title: Flashcards site
list.description: A comprehensive flashcard study application built with Nuxt.js, Vue 3, and TypeScript. Features touch-friendly interactions and seamless card management for effective language learning and knowledge retention.

features.title: Touch-Optimized Interface
features.description: Responsive design with gesture support for mobile and tablet devices. Swipe to flip cards, tap to reveal answers, and intuitive touch controls make studying comfortable on any device.

features.title: Flexible Card Management
features.description: Upload flashcards via JSON import, create custom decks, and organize cards by topic or difficulty.

features.title: Progress Tracking & Study Controls
features.description: Visual progress indicators show words mastered, completion percentage through card decks, and study session statistics. Shuffle mode randomizes card order for varied practice, while progress bars track your learning journey and maintain motivation.

features.title: Offline Support
features.description: Progressive Web App capabilities enable studying without internet connection. Local storage preserves your progress and deck data, syncing seamlessly when back online.

features.title: Seamless Performance
features.description: Nuxt.js server-side rendering ensures fast loading times while Vue 3's Composition API provides smooth animations and responsive interactions throughout the study experience.

list.title: QR Code Generator
list.description: A sophisticated QR code generation tool built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Generate highly customizable QR codes for Wi-Fi networks, URLs, text content, and contact information with advanced styling options, real-time preview, and mobile-optimized interface.

features.title: Multiple Content Types
features.description: Support for Wi-Fi credentials (SSID, password, encryption types including WEP/WPA/WPA2/WPA3, hidden networks), direct URL links, plain text content, and vCard contact information with automatic format validation.

features.title: Comprehensive Styling Control
features.description: Choose from 6 distinct dot patterns including Square, Rounded, Dots, Classy, and Extra Rounded styles. Apply single colors or gradients to dots, corner squares, corner dots, and backgrounds with independent corner style customization.

features.title: Custom Logo Integration
features.description: Embed custom logos with adjustable sizing (10%-50%) and configurable margins (0-50px). Smart background dot hiding and automatic error correction optimization ensure perfect logo integration without compromising scanability.

features.title: Seamless User Experience
features.description: Real-time QR code generation with instant preview updates. Mobile-responsive design with touch-friendly sliding preview panel for optimal mobile experience. One-click PNG export with descriptive filenames.

features.title: Robust Technical Foundation
features.description: Built on qr-code-styling library v1.6.0 with adaptive error correction levels (Medium for standard codes, High for logo-embedded codes). Fully client-side processing ensures privacy and speed with cross-platform browser compatibility.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.name: Name
contact.getBack: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.reachOut: I love coding and collaborating with others. Feel free to reach out using the contact information below or by filling out the form.

navCards.cardDescription: Explore a collection of projects showcasing my development skills.
Review my background, education, and work experience.
Discover my journey, interests, and my passion for development.

sections.title: The Beginning
sections.content: I discovered my passion for programming while studying Aeronautical Engineering at Instituto Politécnico Nacional in Mexico, where I first encountered the power of code in solving complex technical challenges.

sections.title: The Transformation
sections.content: What started as a curiosity quickly turned into a deep appreciation for building solutions that address real-world problems. Now, as I pursue a Bachelor of Applied Science in Software Development at BYU-Idaho, I focus on creating practical applications that solve everyday challenges for users.

sections.title: Hands-On Experience
sections.content: Through my academic projects and hands-on learning, I've built applications that tackle real problems: FileX for seamless file sharing, a Task Manager for productivity, a Real-Time Chat App for communication, and a containerized Sudoku Solver. I've also created tools like a Chrome extension that enhances language learning efficiency on Duolingo.

sections.title: Technical Growth
sections.content: These projects have strengthened my ability to work with modern web technologies including React, Next.js, TypeScript, and cloud services. I've implemented real-time features with WebSocket connections, integrated cloud storage solutions, and deployed containerized applications. Each project taught me to write cleaner code and think about user experience.

sections.title: Looking Forward
sections.content: I'm excited to continue growing as a full-stack developer, refining my skills in scalable web applications and problem-solving. I'm open to opportunities in software development, including front-end, back-end, and full-stack positions where I can contribute to impactful projects while learning from experienced professionals.

sections.title: Let's Connect
sections.content: I'd love to connect with others who share a passion for technology, innovation, and continuous learning—let's build something great together!

footer.aboutDeveloper: A passionate software developer specializing in building modern web applications with Vue, React, Nuxt.js, and Next.js.

summary.title: Software Developer | Frontend & Full-Stack Focus
points: Motivated developer focused on building accessible, user-focused applications.
Hands-on experience with React, Vue, and full-stack development in academic and project settings.
Background in front-end frameworks, backend systems, and agile workflows.

skills.title: The skills, tools, and technologies I use:

degrees.degree: Bachelor of Applied Science in Software Development
details: Built and deployed scalable web applications using front-end and backend frameworks.
Collaborated in agile teams to deliver features and debug production issues.
Built a solid foundation in mathematics, physics, and programming.
Specialized in aeronautic maintenance and manufacturing practices.

jobs.title: Industrial Electrician Apprentice
details: Assisted in electrical installations, including pulling wire, setting up rigid tubing, and wiring lighting systems, motors, and control equipment.
Performed plant maintenance and installed wire trays to support electrical infrastructure.
Gained practical experience in industrial electrical systems under supervision of licensed electricians.

jobs.title: Manufacturing Depot Intern
details: Managed Inventory by controlling input/output of materials in the manufacturing depot.
Delivered hands-on laboratory instruction in machining (lathe, mill), welding, and safety procedures.
Contributed to maintenance and projects that improved workshop functionality and student learning spaces.

jobs.title: English Teacher (ESL)
details: Taught English as a Second Language to students across varying proficiency levels, adapting lesson plans to suit individual learning needs.
Assisted in curriculum development and peer-reviewed classroom practices to improve teaching quality.
Provided administrative support, including front-office assistance for prospective students and payment processing.

jobs.title: Inventory & Purchasing Specialist
details: Monitored stock levels, ensuring availability of parts and supplies critical to daily operations.
Managed purchasing within budget constraints, coordinating with suppliers for timely deliveries.
Supported workshop efficiency by maintaining accurate inventory records.
